seo.title: Nefara - Web, mobile and desktop applications to help your business grow.
seo.description: At Nefara we build web, mobile, and desktop applications, as well as AI solutions tailored to your business. From modern apps to custom AI development, Nefara helps companies grow, innovate, and stay competitive.

hero.title: Custom Software
hero.content: Transform your ideas into powerful digital experiences. We craft exceptional websites, desktop applications, and mobile appsthat drive real business results.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: Comprehensive software development services designed to transform your ideas into powerful digital solutions that scale with your business.

content.text: Modern, responsive websites and web applications built with cutting-edge technologies that deliver exceptional user experiences.
Powerful desktop software solutions for Windows, macOS, and Linux with native performance and intuitive interfaces.
content.content1: Cross platform for all operating systems

content.text: Powerful desktop software solutions for Windows, macOS, and Linux with native performance and intuitive interfaces.
content.content1: Cross platform for all operating systems

services.subtext: Don't see exactly what you need? We create custom solutions for unique challenges.

devs.title: Developers
devs.content: We are a team of young people with numerous achievements in competitions, including the largest international student hackathon in the world. We are graduates of TUES at TU Sofia - the best IT high school on the Balkan Peninsula. From an early age, we have been working on software projects and integrating artificial intelligence, and one of our members already has several published scientific papers.

code.title: Efficiency
code.content: Our experience in hackathons and competitions has made us efficient and fast at writing code. We guarantee fast and personalized services at a high professional level, as well as support if the client wants it.

solutions.title: Code
solutions.content: Our code is entirely written by us without any third-party services that would incur additional costs for you. We strive to keep up with trends and use the latest technologies such as ReactJS, React Native, ThreeJS, Motion, ElectronJS, Java Spring Boot, Django Rest Framework, FastAPI, NodeJS, PyTorch, Pandas, TensorFlow, Cloud Services, and Docker.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.content: Ready to start your project? Contact us now. We will review your request and get back to you as soon as possible to hopefully start working together.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.divider: You can also reach us at

footer.text: Web, mobile and desktop applications for your business.
